Welcome!
‍
With a decade of hands-on experience delighting customers in the F&B industry, I've cultivated a passion for both learning and creating. As a self-taught IT professional, I'm driven to explore the multifaceted world of technology.

My expertise spans UI/UX and graphic design, web development, no-code programming, AI Automation, blockchain, and e-commerce. I also bring strong analytical, operational management, and marketing skills to the table, enabling me to approach projects with a holistic understanding.

I thrive on simplifying complex technologies and fostering vibrant online communities, making innovation accessible and engaging for everyone

Explore my portfolio to see how my unique blend of skills and experiences translates into impactful solutions.

Ready to simplify complexity and empower your community? Get in touch and let's explore the possibilities.

A little about me.

I'm a passionate community builder and content creator deeply immersed in the world of blockchain. Driven by a desire to make technology accessible, I've actively fostered thriving Telegram communities centered around crypto and play-to-earn gaming. My hands-on experience building Junior Coin, a meme token dedicated to my beloved cat, ignited my interest in blockchain's potential. I'm now seeking opportunities to bring my WRA Fractional Investment DeFi project to life, empowering individuals to participate in real-world asset ownership. I'm also a skilled web developer and automation specialist, always eager to find innovative ways to enhance user experiences. I'm excited to leverage my diverse skills and experiences to make a meaningful impact in Dubai's dynamic tech scene.

I'm a Driven General Manager, Passionate Mixologist, Tech Innovator and IT Polymath, Anime Aficionado, Duck-Tape Programmer & so much more. Each day I blend hospitality with cutting-edge technology, explore new worlds, and strive to make the world a better place.
